												Don't bother.   Terrible physics, no instructions or abiliity to customoze the control (you can't even change the keys for input), and ok graphics.   I actually think the vehicle speeds up when in a skid and you can't correct you way out of it.  Very difficult to even stay on the road, let alone pass any other vehicleIt's free so no harm, no fowl.  Sorry, but I found nothing enjoyable, cute, funny, or entertaining in this game

number of helpful: 7 of 8 people (88%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: December 27, 2016
												Maybe i didnt give it enough time but i attempted at least 15 races and it seems stupidly difficult.I enjoy games with a good amount of difficulty as it feel more of an achievement when you finally achieve something however this is a free quick racer and i havn't been able to win one race yet.Alot of people complain about the controls. I dont think they are bad. Only took 2 races to get used to them however the AI's trucks just seem to be much faster!I'm happy to accept that I might just be rubbish at it! I don't really play racers.I can see the appeal for the game and I think if you are willing to try and try and try because you really love racing games then give it ago. But for me, i just don't want to try the same race 100 times to win............................................A little bit more about game play. For a free game i actually enjoyed the graphics and the tracks are nice. There seemed to be quite a few different ones and i only tried 4-5.Vehicles custimation looks cool and you need to unlock it by progressing through the 'impossible' Championship mode :)There are two modes free race i think it was and championship mode which had roughly 20-30 races...............................................Summary: I guess i could give it more time, i like the customisation and the graphics are ok. I just cannot be bothered to try and try again!feel slightly harsh not recommending it now because it isnt terrible......

Posted: December 23, 2016
												Well, you get what you pay for. This is yet another P.O.S. Unity "Personal Edition" racing game. I am baffled at how these keep showing up on Steam. No proper settings, no controller support, graphics look like garbage (Think PS2 if I'm being generous) and the physics make me think this game is supposed to be happening on some other planet where the gravity is turned on and off at random. I'm guessing any positive reviews were written by (or paid for by) the creator of this "game". Don't waste your time.

Posted: January 14
												SYSTEM REQUIREMENTSMINIMUM: OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10 DirectX: Version 9.0That's a damn lie. I have a FirePro V4800 1GB GDDR5 card, Using a Xeon Quad 3220 2.4ghz, 4GB DDR3 memory and the game runs like hell stuttering at 30fps. Pros+Graphics are not bad at allCons-Everything elseBad controlsGame is demanding, yea that's funny i know.GameTop has some fun games, this isn't one of them. If they added real gamepad support and fix the graphic engine, it wouldn't so be so bad.

Posted: March 16
												A quite nice little and free game. It provided me with 5h of fun until i finished the game (every race 1st place).I liked the music most of the time, that you can upgrade parts, and the feeling the game gives you, also the suspense of not doing any mistake and constantly watrching the rear mirror for some opponent coming from behind like hell (Yes they are faster than you, specially at the beginning :D).Really difficult at the beginning, basically your only chance is to push the cars so they crash and you are 1st, hope they crash into each other fighting for the 1st position, or just go on driving and hope you see some crashed car along the way so you can get his position. When that happens, you just have to maintain (hopefully) 1st place and hope you dont crash (Yeah, the physics are not really accurate, specially in the corners, and when you crash it takes a klot of time until you are back on your "feet").Later in the game, when you get some better parts, namely Nitro/Boost, you basically only loose when you are a bad driver as it gives you a huge advantage.Pity its not multiplayer. Also, dont "continue" or "restart" the event, go always back to the main menu (the reason is when you dont go back to the main menu, the Esc key wont work anymore, it works only when you go every time back to main menu. Probably this is a unity bug because the other game they published has also an issue with the Esc key)So in my opinion, the positive:- A lot of fun :D- Nice music- Beautiful- Not really easyThe negative:- Only single player- Physics not always accurate, but in general ok- Esc key bugGrab it! :)

Posted: January 18
												It's arcade off-road racing, where jumping will most often just slide you uncontrollably off track. this feature is very anti-fun itself. If they fixed the phisics and made controls more responsive wouldn't hurt. The controls can be cusomized in the external setup, I don't like this method much, but at least it can be done. So far I noticed it's stuttering on every video quality settings, which just screams of poor optimization. The steering is bad and also the vehicle skins are mostly weird-looking. The sound setting is not remebered, you have to set it in the menu and then in game again (for example if the volume is too low or too loud. In my case I listened to my music and had to lower the volume twice. I don't reccomend this game because of all the stuff I mentioned But overall it's a free game with decent graphics and it's really not that bad because of this fact alone, it's a small game and everyone is welcomed to try it out.
